amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for ARPA-E by $20 million and reduces funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds in the Advanced Research Projects Agency - Energy by $20,000,000 and reduce funds in the Departmental Administration by $20,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
